events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and our team will review it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department based on your experience and resume.
A recruiter specialized in software engineering roles has been assigned to your application to assist you through the process.
We conducted the initial screening call to discuss your background and motivations for applying to our engineering team.
Thank you for your prompt response and for providing additional details about your experience with backend development frameworks.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for April 10th at 2 PM UTC with our senior engineering team.
You successfully completed the technical interview where you demonstrated strong problem-solving skills and knowledge of system design.
An HR interview has been scheduled for April 15th at 11 AM UTC to discuss culture fit and compensation expectations.
The HR interview was completed successfully with positive feedback regarding your alignment with company values.
An official offer has been sent to you with details about the salary, benefits, and start date for the Software Engineer position.
We received your feedback confirming your enthusiasm about joining our engineering team and your acceptance of the offer terms.
You have accepted the offer. We are excited to welcome you aboard and start your onboarding process.
Your onboarding has officially started with access to all necessary resources and introductory meetings scheduled.
The recruitment process has been successfully closed with your hire confirmed as a Software Engineer at our company.
